evidence.claim: Ultra Therapy Solutions utilizes AWS cloud services for its platform infrastructure.
The company supports HIPAA-compliant solutions for data handling and transmission.
Integration with EHR systems is facilitated through FHIR APIs.
X12 EDI transaction sets are used for billing and insurance processes.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in HIPAA X12 transactions and utilizes API-based integration for healthcare data exchange.
matched_use_cases: clearinghouse services for healthcare data interchange
